CharacterStyleRange.Content: Dear Brothers and Friends of Sigma,
As you may know as a homeowner, things often need repair and upkeep. This is now especially true of Sigma’s chapter house at 1601 Washtenaw Avenue.

The path leading from the sidewalk of Washtenaw Avenue to the chapter house is in serious need of repair and refurbishment. However, rather than simply pour new concrete, we had a better idea. We’re providing a unique opportunity to leave a permanent mark on Sigma’s chapter house with personalized bricks for the path!
Dedicate the brick to your family, your graduating class, ΛΧΑ, whatever you choose! Fill out and mail the order form below by March 29 to donate a brick and choose the message you leave.
This project will not only bring a much-needed update to our pathway, but also an unmatched opportunity to leave a physical mark on the chapter you continue to sustain.
If you have any questions or concerns, I hope you’ll contact me—I’m more than happy to answer any and all of them.
